title: How to Make Fluffy Vanilla Pancakes

steps.headline: Sift the flour, baking powder, and sugar in a medium bowl.
Combine the milk, melted butter, egg, and vanilla extract in a large bowl.
Gently mix the dry ingredients in the wet ingredient bowl.
Spread plastic wrap over the bowl and chill in the refrigerator overnight.
Prepare the skillet on a medium-high heat with butter.
Pour a spoonful of batter on the skillet.
Let the batter cook for a minute or two.
steps.description: Wait until bubbles appear at the top.

steps.headline: Use a spatula to flip the pancake over.
steps.description: Cook on the other side for another minute or two until golden brown.

steps.headline: Serve with your favorite pancake syrup and garnishes.

text: Sift the flour, baking powder, and sugar in a medium bowl.  Combine the milk, melted butter, egg, and vanilla extract in a large bowl.  Gently mix the dry ingredients in the wet ingredient bowl.  Spread plastic wrap over the bowl and chill in the refrigerator overnight.  Prepare the skillet on a medium-high heat with butter.  Pour a spoonful of batter on the skillet.  Let the batter cook for a minute or two. Wait until bubbles appear at the top. Use a spatula to flip the pancake over. Cook on the other side for another minute or two until golden brown. Serve with your favorite pancake syrup and garnishes.
